title: Kamala Harris Speaks Up On The Kind Of Gun She Uses. It's A Glock.
content: Democratic presidential candidate Democratic presidential candidate Kamala Harris revealed in an interview broadcast Monday that she owns a Glock semi-automatic pistol -- and said that "of course" she'd fired it on a shooting range.
summary: Democratic presidential candidate Democratic presidential candidate Kamala Harris revealed in an interview broadcast Monday that she owns a Glock semi-automatic pistol -- and said that "of course" she'd fired it on a shooting range.

title: Taylor Swift Surpasses Rihanna In Music Rich List, Her Net Worth Is...
content: Pop sensation Taylor Swift is now the world's richest female musician. As of October 8, 2024, Swift has an estimated net worth of $1.6 billion, surpassing another singing superstar Rihanna, Forbes reported.
summary: Pop sensation Taylor Swift is now the world's richest female musician. As of October 8, 2024, Swift has an estimated net worth of $1.6 billion, surpassing another singing superstar Rihanna, Forbes reported.

title: 2 Men Tricked Apple Into Sending iPhones Worth $2.5 Million. Here's How
content: Two men were sentenced this week for orchestrating a sophisticated scheme, tricking Apple into shipping thousands of iPhones and defrauding the tech giant of $2.5 million.
summary: Two men were sentenced this week for orchestrating a sophisticated scheme, tricking Apple into shipping thousands of iPhones and defrauding the tech giant of $2.5 million.

title: YouTuber Crashes His $200,000 MacLaren While Driving On Livestream
content: Mr Doherty, 20, who has nearly 15 million subscribers, is known for his controversial prank videos and displays of wealth.
summary: Mr Doherty, 20, who has nearly 15 million subscribers, is known for his controversial prank videos and displays of wealth.

title: Category 5 Hurricane Milton Approaches Florida, 2nd Major Storm In Weeks
content: Hurricane Milton exploded in strength Monday to become a potentially catastrophic Category 5 storm bound for Florida, threatening the US state with a second ferocious hurricane in as many weeks.
summary: Hurricane Milton exploded in strength Monday to become a potentially catastrophic Category 5 storm bound for Florida, threatening the US state with a second ferocious hurricane in as many weeks.

title: Qantas Flight Plays Adult Film Due To Technical Error, Apologises Later
content: Passengers aboard a flight to Tokyo last week got more inflight entertainment than they bargained for last week when an explicit film featuring sex talk and explicit images was broadcast to every screen.
summary: Passengers aboard a flight to Tokyo last week got more inflight entertainment than they bargained for last week when an explicit film featuring sex talk and explicit images was broadcast to every screen.

title: "October 7 Attack Would Never Have Happened If I Was President": Trump
content: Republican US presidential nominee Donald Trump warned Monday that Americans should "never forget" the October 7, 2023, attacks on Israel by Hamas militants as he paid tribute to the victims at a campaign event.
summary: Republican US presidential nominee Donald Trump warned Monday that Americans should "never forget" the October 7, 2023, attacks on Israel by Hamas militants as he paid tribute to the victims at a campaign event.

title: "No Lesser Evil Between Trump, Harris" Says Green Party Nominee Jill Stein
content: Widespread anger among Arab Americans and Muslims over US support for Israel's wars in Gaza and Lebanon could cost Vice President Kamala Harris, the Democratic nominee, the election, Green Party candidate Jill Stein told Reuters on Sunday.
summary: Widespread anger among Arab Americans and Muslims over US support for Israel's wars in Gaza and Lebanon could cost Vice President Kamala Harris, the Democratic nominee, the election, Green Party candidate Jill Stein told Reuters on Sunday.

title: Harris Says She Won't Meet Putin For Truce Unless Ukraine Is Represented
content: Democratic White House hopeful Kamala Harris said in an interview broadcast Monday that if elected president she would not meet with Vladimir Putin for peace talks if Ukraine was not also represented.
summary: Democratic White House hopeful Kamala Harris said in an interview broadcast Monday that if elected president she would not meet with Vladimir Putin for peace talks if Ukraine was not also represented.

title: Musk Says He Is "All In" For Donald Trump As The Next US President
content: Elon Musk is ramping up his public support of Donald Trump, telling Tucker Carlson in a conversation streamed Monday that he is "all in" on the Republican presidential candidate.
summary: Elon Musk is ramping up his public support of Donald Trump, telling Tucker Carlson in a conversation streamed Monday that he is "all in" on the Republican presidential candidate.

title: Israeli Army Says Some Projectiles Fired From Lebanon Intercepted
content: The Israeli army on Monday night said approximately five projectiles were fired into the country from Lebanon, some of them were intercepted by the aerial defence system.
summary: The Israeli army on Monday night said approximately five projectiles were fired into the country from Lebanon, some of them were intercepted by the aerial defence system.

title: US Court Orders Google To Open Android To Rival App Stores
content: A US judge on Monday ordered Google to open its Android smartphone operating system to rival app stores, in a fresh legal setback for the tech giant.
summary: A US judge on Monday ordered Google to open its Android smartphone operating system to rival app stores, in a fresh legal setback for the tech giant.

title: Hezbollah Says It Targeted Israeli Military Base Near Tel Aviv
content: Lebanese militant group Hezbollah said it had targeted an Israeli military intelligence base near Tel Aviv on Monday.
summary: Lebanese militant group Hezbollah said it had targeted an Israeli military intelligence base near Tel Aviv on Monday.

title: Will Continue To Fight For "Sacred Mission": Netanyahu On 1st Year Of War
content: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu, at an official memorial marking the anniversary of October 7 attack Monday, vowed to press on fighting until achieving the "sacred mission" of the war against Hamas.
summary: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu, at an official memorial marking the anniversary of October 7 attack Monday, vowed to press on fighting until achieving the "sacred mission" of the war against Hamas.

title: Israel Army Issues New Call For South Beirut Residents To Evacuate
content: The Israeli army on Monday issued their latest call for residents to evacuate from areas in southern Beirut, following a string of similar messages as the military bombs Hezbollah positions in Lebanon's capital.
summary: The Israeli army on Monday issued their latest call for residents to evacuate from areas in southern Beirut, following a string of similar messages as the military bombs Hezbollah positions in Lebanon's capital.

title: RuPay Launch In Maldives, New Airport At Runway To Boost Ties With India
content: The inauguration of a new runaway in the Maldives built under an airport redevelopment project assisted by India and the official launch of the RuPay card in the island nation on Monday are aimed at boosting relations.
summary: The inauguration of a new runaway in the Maldives built under an airport redevelopment project assisted by India and the official launch of the RuPay card in the island nation on Monday are aimed at boosting relations.

title: Jailed Imran Khan Banned From Meeting Wife, Lawyers Over "Security Concerns"
content: Pakistan's Punjab government on Monday banned jailed former premier Imran Khan from meeting his family members, lawyers and party leaders till October 18 due to "security concerns".
summary: Pakistan's Punjab government on Monday banned jailed former premier Imran Khan from meeting his family members, lawyers and party leaders till October 18 due to "security concerns".

title: Mexican Mayor Decapitated 6 Days After Taking Office, Head Found On Truck
content: The mayor of the capital of Mexico's violence-plagued state of Guerrero was killed on Sunday less than a week after he took office, the state's governor confirmed.
summary: The mayor of the capital of Mexico's violence-plagued state of Guerrero was killed on Sunday less than a week after he took office, the state's governor confirmed.

title: Illegal Immigrants Are Bringing "Bad Genes" Into US: Donald Trump
content: Donald Trump said Monday that illegal immigrants were bringing "bad genes" into the United States, doubling down on previous inflammatory rhetoric about migrants poisoning the blood of the country.
summary: Donald Trump said Monday that illegal immigrants were bringing "bad genes" into the United States, doubling down on previous inflammatory rhetoric about migrants poisoning the blood of the country.
